technical_debt_gaps.description: /blog, /case-studies, /website-translation listed in sitemap without trailing slashes but server redirects to trailing-slash variants. Wasting extremely limited crawl budget on 301 chains.
technical_debt_gaps.action: Update generate-sitemap.js to emit trailing-slash URLs for all static pages that redirect.

technical_debt_gaps.description: Only homepage is indexed after 7.5 weeks. However, 2 new content-based queries appeared this cycle, indicating topical crawling is beginning.
technical_debt_gaps.action: Continue GSC URL submissions for priority content pages. Monitor for next audit cycle.

technical_debt_gaps.description: GA4 shows traffic to launchedin10website.pages.dev, launchedin10-final.pages.dev, and launchedin10-app.pages.dev. These subdomains may compete with the canonical domain.
technical_debt_gaps.action: Add X-Robots-Tag: noindex header or meta noindex to all .pages.dev preview deployments via Cloudflare headers.

technical_debt_gaps.description: 11 rows use 'Seo Fundamentals' instead of 'SEO Fundamentals'. Will cause duplicate category silos when processed.
technical_debt_gaps.action: UPDATE orbit_3_flow SET category = 'SEO Fundamentals' WHERE category = 'Seo Fundamentals' AND website_url ILIKE '%launchedin10%'

content_pipeline_assessment.status: SATURATED — 61 pending entries already cover all 5 category silos. No new content gaps to ingest this cycle.
content_pipeline_assessment.recommendation: Focus on processing existing pipeline rather than adding new gaps. Priority should be indexing acceleration and technical fixes.

note: Zero zombie targets — all content < 2 months old. 6-month incubation grace period strictly enforced.
